description_html:
Contour is a new series for Spatial Element, who specializes in 3 dimensional, hand formed fabrics. Contour is a lush active surface of woven panels of 3 dimensional silk fabric. This piece is 4 feet in diameter made with a metallic silk.
Contour is available in the following sizes: 6', 5', 4', 3' and 2' diameters.
A wall of various sized pieces would compliment any feature wall. Spatial Element also makes a lush pleated fabric which is an available option for the Contour series.

Spatial Element places an emphasis on creative collaboration and is available for
projects of any size and scope.
We look forward to helping you develop your project.
